markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 19"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cube of Recall](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2189)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 114 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 40,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small cube has smooth matte sides. One side is black, the opposite side is white, and the other four are various shades of gray. Each side can be attuned to a location and then teleport you back to that spot in the blink of an eye.

<document level="2" id="action-1686" />

<document level="2" id="action-1687" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cube of Recall
